meta.purpose: Decision makers and insider contacts for Tier 1 venues

keyPeople.historical: José Padilla (deceased 2020) - original DJ who made the venue famous
keyPeople.current: Pig&Dan - released 'Journey Within' album (June 2025) - 45th anniversary collaboration

cafe_del_mar_ibiza.bookingApproach: Contact through Café del Mar Music label for artist collaborations
cafe_del_mar_ibiza.notes: 45 years in 2025. New look, refreshed sound. Artist-led album is new approach.

keyPeople.saxophonist: Jimmy Sax - headline performer, manager: Livio Giovannucci
keyPeople.note: They have regular sunset saxophonists - your RAV Vast is similar positioning

phi_beach_sardinia.bookingApproach: Email booking@phibeach.com positioning as 'live sunset musician like your saxophone tradition, but RAV Vast'
phi_beach_sardinia.ranking: #1 Italian club in DJ Mag Top 100

keyPeople.note: Part of Sublime Hotels group - contact groups@sublimehotels.pt for music programming

sublime_comporta.bookingApproach: Email groups@sublimehotels.pt for DJ/music events, or DM Instagram for beach club specific
sublime_comporta.features: Beach Bar with DJ and dance area, sunset events

musicSchedule.rituals: Mon, Wed, Fri, Sat - experimental live performances from 7pm
musicSchedule.dj_nights: Tue, Thu, Sun - resident + guest DJs

scorpios_mykonos.notes: They have dedicated experimental live performance nights - PERFECT for hybrid RAV Vast set

rocky_on_percussion.name: Rocky on Percussion
rocky_on_percussion.note: DIRECT COMPETITOR - same format as Flutur. Study his positioning.

jimmy_sax.name: Jimmy Sax
jimmy_sax.note: Saxophone + DJ is accepted format at luxury venues - RAV Vast can fit same slot

mn2s.name: MN2S
mn2s.note: Started as DJ agency, now global music management. Check if they rep organic house live acts.

actionItems: 1. SUBMIT to Scorpios via their booking form (scorpios.com/scorpios-music-booking-request)
2. Email Phi Beach booking@phibeach.com - position as 'sunset live musician like Jimmy Sax'
3. Email Sublime groups@sublimehotels.pt for music programming
4. Study Rocky on Percussion (rockypercussion.com) - same format, see his positioning
5. Contact MN2S to see if they rep organic house live acts
